snippet: The Anti-Discrimination Center, a nonprofit group, has filed a lawsuit on behalf of three black residents against New York City in federal court claiming the city promotes segregation.
abstract: Group of black New York City residents files federal lawsuit against city claiming subsidized housing lottery system, which reserves portion of units for applicants who already live in neighborhood, perpetuates racial segregation and denies equal opportunities to ethnic minorities.
lead_paragraph: The Anti-Discrimination Center, a nonprofit group, has filed a lawsuit on behalf of three black residents against New York City in federal court claiming the city promotes segregation.
